option.name: originalContent
option.value:
MarketCore
Demo Solutions Features Contact
Get Template

MarketCore. Two Worlds.
Developers & Merchants United.

MarketCore is the complete marketplace & e-commerce solution for developers who build — and merchants who sell. Deploy instantly, manage easily, and grow your business online.

Try Live Demo Watch Video

Built for Developers & Merchants

Two powerful solutions, one platform

‍

For Developers

Skip months of boilerplate. MarketCore provides a modular, secure, and ready-to-deploy Spring Boot architecture with seller, admin, and user roles included.

  • ✅ Spring Boot 3 + Thymeleaf + TailwindCSS
  • ✅ Spring Security 6 + Role-based access
  • ✅ Configurable marketplace/e-commerce mode
️

For Merchants

Start selling online instantly. No coding needed — just add your products, manage orders, and grow your sales on a professional marketplace platform.

  • ✅ Create your online store in minutes
  • ✅ Secure payment & order tracking
  • ✅ Simple admin dashboard to manage everything

Powerful Features

Everything you need to launch your marketplace

Advanced Security

Spring Security 6 with role-based access control, secure authentication, and protection against common vulnerabilities

⚡

Fast & Responsive

Built with modern technologies - Spring Boot 3, Thymeleaf, and TailwindCSS for optimal performance

Fully Customizable

Modular architecture allows you to customize and extend functionality to match your specific needs

Payment Ready

Cash on Delivery included. Stripe integration available on demand. Complete order management, invoicing, and transaction tracking

Admin Dashboard

Comprehensive admin panel to manage products, orders, users, and analytics in one place

Mobile Optimized

Fully responsive design that works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

Want to Learn More?

Discover all features in detail, installation instructions, and much more in our complete documentation.

Read Full Documentation →

Complete guide with code examples, architecture, and FAQ

See MarketCore in Action

Watch the full walkthrough — from browsing products to managing orders.

Try the live demo →

Contact Us

Questions, custom setup, or partnership? We'd love to hear from you.

Email:

contactmarketcore@gmail.com

Average response time: under 24 hours.

Connect with us

▶️

© 2025 MarketCore – Built with ❤️ using Spring Boot & TailwindCSS

GitHub • YouTube • Gumroad
